Program.Name: Fluent
Program.NewsInVersion: - Automatically handled transform when needed (to convert a model with information of a previous version)

- New (being tested) reinitialization algorithm. - Big improvement in the files exporting speed - Prism and pyramid elements are now supported - Boundary conditions have been reviewed - Graphical interface and interactive help have been updated - Solved problems with surface meshing in 3D problems and with linear meshing in 2D cases - Solved the handedness problem exporting tetrahedra elements
